King of Kings.quote: And on His robe and on His thigh He has a name written, 'KING OF KINGS, AND LORD OF LORDS.' (Revelation 19:16)

The Most High.quote: I will praise the LORD according to His righteousness, And will sing praise to the name of the LORD Most High. (Psalm 7:17)

The Ancient of Days.quote: The Ancient of Days took His seat; His vesture was like white snow And the hair of His head like pure wool. (Daniel 7:9)

The Almighty.quote: I am the Almighty God; walk before me, and be thou perfect. (Genesis 17:1)

Supreme Being.quote: The Supreme Being is the source of all emanations and the foundation of existence itself. (Vedic Texts)

Lord of Hosts.quote: Holy, holy, holy is the LORD of hosts; the whole earth is full of His glory! (Isaiah 6:3)

The All-Merciful.quote: The Most Gracious, the Most Merciful, Master of the Day of Judgment. (Quran 1:3-4)

The Creator.quote: Remember also your Creator in the days of your youth. (Ecclesiastes 12:1)

The Preserver.quote: The Lord is faithful, who shall establish you and guard you from evil. (2 Thessalonians 3:3)

The Destroyer.quote: I am become Death, the destroyer of worlds. (Bhagavad Gita 11:32)

The Alpha and Omega.quote: I am the Alpha and the Omega, the beginning and the end, says the Lord God. (Revelation 1:8)

The Light of the World.quote: I am the light of the world. Whoever follows me will not walk in darkness. (John 8:12)

The Great Spirit.quote: The Great Spirit is in all things: the air we breathe, the trees, the grass, the clouds. (Native American Tradition)

The Divine Mother.quote: The Divine Mother is the power behind all creation, preservation, and dissolution. (Devi Mahatmya)

The Absolute.quote: The Absolute is beyond all attributes and forms, yet contains all within itself. (Advaita Vedanta)

The Living God.quote: My soul thirsts for God, for the living God. (Psalm 42:2)

The Eternal One.quote: Before the mountains were brought forth, or ever you had formed the earth and the world, from everlasting to everlasting you are God. (Psalm 90:2)

The Supreme Teacher.quote: The Lord himself is the supreme teacher who awakens wisdom in the soul. (Upanishads)

The Good Shepherd.quote: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep. (John 10:11)

The Source of All.quote: From whom all beings originate and to whom all return. (Bhagavad Gita)

The Most High God.quote: Melchizedek was priest of God Most High, Creator of heaven and earth. (Genesis 14:18-19)

The Holy One.quote: Holy, Holy, Holy, is the LORD of hosts, The whole earth is full of His glory. (Isaiah 6:3)

The Divine Architect.quote: The great architect of the universe built all things by measure, number, and weight. (Wisdom 11:20)

The All-Knowing.quote: His knowledge encompasses the heavens and the earth. (Quran 2:255)

The Wise One.quote: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God! (Romans 11:33)

The Supreme Soul.quote: The Supreme Soul dwells in the heart of all beings. (Bhagavad Gita 13:17)

The First and the Last.quote: I am the First and I am the Last; besides Me there is no God. (Isaiah 44:6)

The Lord of All.quote: The earth is the Lord's, and everything in it, the world, and all who live in it. (Psalm 24:1)

The All-Compassionate.quote: The Lord is gracious and compassionate, slow to anger and rich in love. (Psalm 145:8)

The Perfect One.quote: As for God, His way is perfect; the word of the LORD is flawless. (Psalm 18:30)

The All-Powerful.quote: With God all things are possible. (Matthew 19:26)

The Ever-Present.quote: Do I not fill heaven and earth? declares the LORD. (Jeremiah 23:24)

The Universal Sovereign.quote: The LORD has established his throne in heaven, and his kingdom rules over all. (Psalm 103:19)

The Divine Protector.quote: The LORD is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer. (Psalm 18:2)

The Highest Truth.quote: I am the way, the truth, and the life. (John 14:6)

The Supreme Guide.quote: For this God is our God forever and ever; he will be our guide even to the end. (Psalm 48:14)
